description: Creates an association between an Amazon Connect Wisdom assistant and another resource. Currently, the only supported association is with a knowledge base. An assistant can have only a single association.

parameters.name: assistantId
parameters.description: The identifier of the Wisdom assistant. Can be either the ID or the ARN. URLs cannot contain the ARN.

parameters.name: association
parameters.description: The identifier of the associated resource. knowledgeBaseId (string) --- The identifier of the knowledge base. This should not be a QUICK_RESPONSES type knowledge base if you're storing Wisdom Content resource to it.

nested_params.name: knowledgeBaseId
nested_params.description: The identifier of the knowledge base. This should not be a QUICK_RESPONSES type knowledge base if you're storing Wisdom Content resource to it.

parameters.name: clientToken
parameters.description: A unique, case-sensitive identifier that you provide to ensure the idempotency of the request. If not provided, the Amazon Web Services SDK populates this field. For more information about idempotency, see Making retries safe with idempotent APIs. This field is autopopulated if not provided.

parameters.name: tags
parameters.description: The tags used to organize, track, or control access for this resource. (string) --- (string) ---

nested_items.name: assistantArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the Wisdom assistant.

nested_items.name: assistantAssociationArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the assistant association.

nested_items.name: assistantAssociationId
nested_items.description: The identifier of the assistant association.

nested_items.name: assistantId
nested_items.description: The identifier of the Wisdom assistant.

nested_items.name: associationData
nested_items.description: A union type that currently has a single argument, the knowledge base ID.

nested_items.name: knowledgeBaseAssociation
nested_items.description: The knowledge base where output data is sent.

nested_items.name: knowledgeBaseArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the knowledge base.

nested_items.name: knowledgeBaseId
nested_items.description: The identifier of the knowledge base. This should not be a QUICK_RESPONSES type knowledge base if you're storing Wisdom Content resource to it.
